reviews.text: Hineno Station has one of the cheapest rates for a night's stay near the Osaka Kansei Airport (Kanku in short), as compared to other hotels of similar quality.
reviews.title: Convenient, comfortable and cost-conscious stay

likes.disliked: — Cigarette smell in non-smoking rooms and floors

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is very conveniently located (20 mins to the airport) with a free shuttle that departs regularly enough. However, the free shuttle in the mornings do get very crowded and it would be wise to reserve in advance the night before.
reviews.title: Airport hotel
